name: The Icon Battles: Game
description:
Take a break from working on your important documents and blow off some steam!

Fight your desktop icons!

The Icon Battles: Game allows you to battle your desktop icons, making it a one-of-a-kind game. Play as any desktop icon you have and choose one of the classes:
  • Archer
  • Axeman
  • Swordsman
  • Melee
  • And more in future updates

Scenarios

Customize your battlefield by selecting which classes are able to participate in battles.

Timing-based combat

Dodge attacks and strike your opponents when they are vulnerable.
